title: PC_1oo1.MiniGolf.Challenge -.direct.play.-ToeD
description:
The One Eyed Dude

provides you with

...:: 1oo1 Mini Golf Challenge  -.direct.play.edition.- ::...

<->( ripped.: nothing )<-><->( added.: 2 littles ;) )<->
             
2 more little games included... Wings of Wind and StarBlaze!.



<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1001 Minigolf Challenge

THE LARGEST MINI-GOLF COURSE IN THE WORLD! 

Over 1000 fun and challenging golf holes to play in this amazing 
3D mini-golf world! 
Are you up for the ultimate challenge? Can you make par? With a 
combination of realgolf rules and mini-golf fun you?ll play mini-golf 
like you never did before! Putt through wacky loops, crazy pipes, 
extreme ramps, and mind-blowing obstacles. 

Play in real 3D! Incredibly Realistic 3D Engine! An intuitive, 
easy-to-use 3D Virtual Play to make it easier for you to sink 
that putt!


:. Features .:

Real 3D Play: ZOOM IN ? ZOOM OUT ? ROTATE 360Ã‚Âº UP, DOWN, LEFT & RIGHT

Wild & Crazy Obstacles: 
?  Flowers & Plants slow you down on the green so watch out! 
Also use them to make skilled ricochet shots.

*  Sand Trap is the obstacle to avoid if you want to keep your 
strokes to a minimum. just as you were on a real golf course!

*  The Fan causes your golf ball to fly up. Depending on the shot,
avoid the Fan or use the Fan to jump over obstacles.

*  The Speeder accelerates the momentum of your golf ball shot. 

*  Wacky Loops, Crazy Pipes & Extreme Ramps brings the classic
fun of mini-golf to your desktop!

*  Multiple Golf Clubs... Choose from a variety of different golf clubs 
to suit your taste!.

*  Player Profiles: Create multiple player profiles.



<->( more )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

no more...


<->( minimum of system requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><->

works on Windows: 98/Me/2000/XP/Vista




<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with WinRar ( newest! ) ... or use 7zip.

2.: double click: mini-launch.exe ( must be done! )

3.: double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and run game with!. 




<->( general hints )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

read everything carefuly, especially the following below ...
